text: e If the consumer sold all of their endowments they would generate an income of m= piwi + paw? so replacing income (m) with the value of the endowments the constraint is expenditure < income pix1+ paxa < P1W1 + P2W2 Or p1(x1—wi)+p2(x2—w2) <0 which says that the total value of their net demands (i.e. x; — w1) must be less than or equal to zero.
